name: Unsloth AI
headline: Open Source Fine-tuning & Training of LLMs
description:
Unsloth helps builders create custom models better & faster. We're developing the all in one solution to help you create highly-accurate custom models 30x faster with 90% less memory use.

With over 8 million monthly model downloads and 15K GitHub stars, our mission is to make fine-tuning and open-source the best it can be!

founders.name: Daniel Han, Founder
founders.description: I was at NVIDIA making algorithms like TSNE 2000x faster. I also found and fixed 20+ bugs in open source LLMs like Gemma, Llama, Mistral and Phi. I also maintain the OSS package Hyperlearn making ML faster for NASA & Microsoft engineers.

founders.name: Michael Han, Founder
founders.description: Hi guys - love building, designing and more. If you ever want help with fine-tuning or LLMs be sure to reach out!

# Latest News
[![Llama 3.2 Meta Unsloth](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/reasoning_nocolor_b1f-oiMLet4vo3v6QFj0N.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)](https://unsloth.ai/</blog/r1-reasoning>)

[![Llama 3.2 Meta Unsloth](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/deepseek_black_white_vr5x7YOB_BpFtgP8j_dx-.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)](https://unsloth.ai/</blog/deepseekr1-dynamic>)
[Run 1.58-bit Dynamic DeepSeek-R1](https://unsloth.ai/</blog/deepseekr1-dynamic>)Jan 27, 2025
[![Llama 3.2 Meta Unsloth](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/phi4_1200_b3jH5bVTAataEsAOVUALU.png?width=3840&quality=80&format=auto)](https://unsloth.ai/</blog/phi4>)
[Phi-4 Finetuning + Bug Fixes](https://unsloth.ai/</blog/phi4>)Jan 10, 2025
[View more news](https://unsloth.ai/</blog>)
# Train your own custom ChatGPT in 24 hrs, not 30 days.
30x faster than FA2 + 30% accuracy
90% less memory usage than FA2
LoRA and QLoRA fine-tuning support
# How are we faster?
By manually deriving all compute heavy maths steps and handwriting GPU kernels, unsloth can magically make training faster without any hardware changes.
[Find out more](https://unsloth.ai/</introducing>)
![cute cat happy being surrounded by 3d code, objects and geometric blocks](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/_fa59568a-b015-47b6-ae72-4cc30b58e0c7_xm6uk6zEk_VJZhtIJjHVM.jpg?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)
![cute sloth on top of a 3d graphics card](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/_1d5a5685-2d88-44ca-b50f-ba432cd646ef_9CGCY8lvw4D9JkOdueqsk.jpeg?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)
# 1 GPU or 100 GPUs
10x faster on a single GPU and up to 32x faster on multiple GPU systems compared to Flash Attention 2 (FA2).We support NVIDIA GPUs from Tesla T4 to H100, and we‚Äôre portable to AMD and Intel GPUs.
[Contact us](https://unsloth.ai/</contact>)[Find out more](https://unsloth.ai/</introducing>)
# Don‚Äôt believe us?
Why not try our fully free open source version? Finetune 2X faster on a single NVIDIA GPU for free on Google Colab or Kaggle Notebooks.
[Get access now](https://unsloth.ai/</>)
![](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/_7ffe0402-d1f0-4d66-aa5f-29254bc56d06_OJ8kyMzfY41BcwNYohY2a.jpg?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)
# The details
# We're making AI training easier for everyone
[Find out more](https://unsloth.ai/</introducing>)
# Unsloth makes everything greener
# Faster hardware is getting harder to make. Armed with our maths and coding expertise, we specialize in optimizing AI and ML workloads.
![cute environment 3d models desert environment with different colours of cactus](https://unsloth.ai/cgi/image/cactus_environment_3d_AgLRj65gO2A8sJWpLsHcc.png?width=2048&quality=80&format=auto)
# Want lightning fast inference? We‚Äôre working on it!
[Contact us](https://unsloth.ai/</contact>)
# Don't forget to join our newsletter!
Submit

# Pricing
# Free
Freeware of our standard version of unsloth
[Get started](https://unsloth.ai/<https:/github.com/unslothai/unsloth>)
  * Open-source
  * Supports Mistral, Gemma
  * Supports LLama 1, 2, 3
  * Single GPU support
  * Supports 4 bit, 16 bit LoRA


# unsloth Pro
Unlock multi GPU support + 2.5x faster training + 20% less VRAM
[Contact us](https://unsloth.ai/</contact>)
  * 2.5x number of GPUs faster than FA2
  * 20% less memory than OSS
  * Multi GPU support
  * Up to 8 GPUS support
  * For any usecase


# unsloth Enterprise
Unlock 30x faster training + multi-node support + 30% accuracy
[Contact us](https://unsloth.ai/</contact>)
  * 32x number of GPUs faster than FA2
  * up to +30% accuracy
  * 5x faster inference
  * Supports full training
  * All Pro plan features
  * Multi-node support
  * Customer support


# Ready to use unsloth?
[Get started for free](https://unsloth.ai/<https:/github.com/unslothai/unsloth#finetune-mistral-gemma-llama-2-5x-faster-with-70-less-memory>)

### Unsloth AI: Effortless AI Model Customization

**Overview**
Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Unsloth AI is on a mission to revolutionize how we train and fine-tune large language models (LLMs). With a goal of supporting open-source initiatives, Unsloth provides builders with sophisticated yet accessible tools to create custom AI models more efficiently.

**Why Unsloth?**
Imagine slashing your model training time by **30 times** and lowering memory usage by **90%**. Unsloth boasts over **8 million monthly downloads** and has garnered **15K stars** on GitHub, a testament to its growing popularity. The team, currently composed of just two members, is dedicated to making AI training not only faster but also greener through optimized workflows.

**How Does It Work?**
The secret sauce lies in Unsloth's unique approach to GPU computing. By handcrafting computation-heavy processes, they offer impressive speed improvements without requiring additional hardware. Whether you're training on a single GPU or scaling up to dozens, Unsloth caters to your needs with remarkable speed and flexibility.

**Current Offerings**
Unsloth.ai provides various options including:

- **Free Version**: An open-source package that supports models like Mistral, Gemma, and Llama 1, 2, and 3.
- **Pro Version**: Enhanced capabilities with multi-GPU support for 2.5x faster training times and 20% less memory usage.
- **Enterprise Solutions**: Up to **30x faster training** with multi-node support and improved accuracy.

**Endorsements**
Some of the biggest names in tech are already utilizing Unsloth‚Äôs technology, including Microsoft, NVIDIA, and NASA, demonstrating its trusted reputation in the industry.

**Community and Support**
Unsloth thrives on community engagement, encouraging developers to join their Discord, read their blog, and stay updated via newsletters. Whether you're a seasoned AI developer or just starting, the resources available‚Äîfrom documentation to community forums‚Äîhelp you along your journey.

**In Summary**
Unsloth AI is paving the way for faster, more efficient AI model training. Its focus on open-source solutions and community empowerment elevates the potential for what builders can achieve with LLMs. If you're keen to skip the lengthy model training and get straight to innovation, Unsloth is definitely worth exploring. 

For more information, visit [Unsloth.ai](https://unsloth.ai/).
